p: Young children are at higher risk of acquiring severe influenza [ 1, 4, 29]. In this study, serious complications were rare, with only 2 ICU admissions and influenza-related symptoms that lasted for approximately 1 week. Since antiviral therapy was at the discretion of the physician, it is not known whether the observed AEs were related to the antiviral usage or a reflection of the severity of influenza virus infection.
